name: Sauvage
description: Fresh and spicy with bergamot and an amber base. Very versatile.
description_es: Fresco y especiado con bergamota y una base ambarada. Muy versátil.

name: Bleu de Chanel
description: Citrus-woody with incense. Elegant and well balanced.
description_es: Cítrico y amaderado con incienso. Elegante y bien equilibrado.

name: Acqua di Giò
description: Marine and citrus notes. Fresh and ideal for summer.
description_es: Notas marinas y cítricas. Fresco e ideal para el verano.

name: Y
description: Apple and ginger with a woody base. Modern and youthful.
description_es: Manzana y jengibre con una base amaderada. Moderno y juvenil.

name: Terre d’Hermès
description: Bitter orange and vetiver. Dry, elegant and sophisticated.
description_es: Naranja amarga y vetiver. Seco, elegante y sofisticado.

name: La Vie Est Belle
description: Sweet and enveloping with vanilla. Very popular.
description_es: Dulce y envolvente con vainilla. Muy popular.

name: Coco Mademoiselle
description: Citrus-floral with patchouli. Elegant and feminine.
description_es: Cítrico-floral con pachulí. Elegante y femenino.

name: Good Girl
description: Intense sweetness with vanilla and cocoa. Ideal for night wear.
description_es: Dulzura intensa con vainilla y cacao. Ideal para la noche.

name: Black Opium
description: Coffee and vanilla with white flowers. Powerful and nocturnal.
description_es: Café y vainilla con flores blancas. Potente y nocturno.

name: Light Blue
description: Mediterranean freshness with lemon and apple. Summery.
description_es: Frescura mediterránea con limón y manzana. Veraniego.

name: CK One
description: Citrus and green tea. Fresh, clean and casual.
description_es: Cítricos y té verde. Fresco, limpio e informal.

name: Baccarat Rouge 540
description: Amber, saffron and resins. High projection.
description_es: Ámbar, azafrán y resinas. Gran proyección.

name: Aventus
description: Pineapple and woods with a smoky touch. Very distinctive.
description_es: Piña y maderas con un toque ahumado. Muy distintivo.

name: Sì
description: Elegant scent with a sweet and woody touch. Versatile.
description_es: Fragancia elegante con un toque dulce y amaderado. Versátil.

name: Ombre Leather
description: Intense leather with floral nuances. Ideal for cold weather.
description_es: Cuero intenso con matices florales. Ideal para climas fríos.

name: Le Male
description: Vanilla and mint with a spicy base. Sweet and iconic.
description_es: Vainilla y menta con una base especiada. Dulce e icónico.

name: Libre
description: Lavender and orange blossom. Modern and intense floral.
description_es: Lavanda y flor de azahar. Floral moderno e intenso.

name: The One
description: Amber and tobacco with spices. Elegant and nocturnal.
description_es: Ámbar y tabaco con especias. Elegante y nocturno.

name: Flowerbomb
description: Explosive floral bouquet with a sweet base. Very feminine.
description_es: Explosivo bouquet floral con una base dulce. Muy femenino.

name: Neroli Portofino
description: Bright neroli and citrus notes. Fresh, elegant and summery.
description_es: Neroli brillante y notas cítricas. Fresco, elegante y veraniego.
